title: Natural Weed Control & Heirloom Flowers in the Garden
itunes:title: Natural Weed Control & Heirloom Flowers in the Garden
description: In this episode Melissa and guest Shaye Elliot from the Elliot Homestead share their tips for natural weed control at planting time so you can spend less time weeding and more time enjoying your garden, especially with the addition of heirloom flowers. You'll learn how to create a cottage style heirloom garden that provides you with beauty through every season with less work, best flowers, how to plan it, resources and more! This special episode will have you weeding less (and with a weeding plan to take away overwhelm) and putting in heirloom flowers to life long enjoyment. Go to the blog post here for resources and Melissa's Instagram to win a copy of both her book and Shaye's!

itunes:subtitle: Less Work & More Beauty in Your Gardens
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
